title: Murder in the US - number of victims by weapon 2018
summary: This bar chart has 16 columns on the x axis representing Weapon Used, and Number of murder victims in each Weapon Used on the y axis.
The maximum Number of murder victims 6603.0 is found at Weapon Used Handguns and the minimum is found at Explosives where Weapon Used is 4.0.
There is a difference of 6599.0 between the maximum Weapon Used Handguns and minimum Weapon Used Explosives.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of murder victims for 16 number of Weapon Useds.
Weapon Used Handguns has the highest Number of murder victims and Explosives has the lowest Number of murder victims.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 16 columns on the x axis representing Weapon Used, and Number of murder victims in each Weapon Used on the y axis.
The maximum Number of murder victims 6603.0 is found at Weapon Used Handguns and the minimum is found at Explosives where Weapon Used is 4.0.

max_summary: This bar chart has 16 columns on the x axis representing Weapon Used, and Number of murder victims in each Weapon Used on the y axis.
The maximum Number of murder victims 6603.0 is found at Weapon Used Handguns and the minimum is found at Explosives where Weapon Used is 4.0.
There is a difference of 6599.0 between the maximum Weapon Used Handguns and minimum Weapon Used Explosives.

Weapon Used Handguns is higher than any other Weapon Useds with value 6603.0, followed by Firearms type not stated, and Knives or cutting instruments. Down to Weapon Used Explosives with the lowest value 4.0.
The Weapon Used Explosives tends to be 7.48 percent lower than average.
Summing up the values of all Weapon Useds, we get total 14123.0.
